name: Stickman Rope Hero City
description:
Best Gangster Game with Amazing Stickman Heroes.

This game concept based on the criminal world full of gangsters mafia who want to destroy the city. This is your battle against the grand crime city gangsters.

Features:
. Amazing graphics and high resolution of the spider stickman.
. Become the fearless spider stickman rope hero criminal.
. Steal cars, dop terrific bank robberies and show your amazing skills.
. Choose weapons that best fit according to the situation.
. Amazing background music with a realistic open world environment.
. Show your car racing skills as well.
. Become the godfather in the open world gangster crime simulator.
